main.title: COVID-19 Cough Data Collection Study
main.note: Please note: This form is for data collection only. It will not predict your COVID-19 status or diagnose any disease, disorder, or other health condition. Virufy is conducting research and will use the information you provide for that research only. Virufy will not take place of a doctor and would like to remind you it is your responsibility to seek medical advice from your doctor.
main.paragraph1: Welcome! This study should only take about 5 minutes to complete.
main.errorCountry: We are unable to collect coughs from your region at this time. Check back with us soon!

helpVirufy.title: About Us
helpVirufy.introParagraph: Welcome to our study! This should only take you about 5 minutes to complete. Before we begin, let’s discuss what we will cover:
helpVirufy.aboutParagraph: <0>Virufy is a nonprofit organization that is working to develop the means to use artificial intelligence (Al) to screen for COVID-19 from cough patternsrapidly and at no cost through use of a smartphone for the benefit of low-income countries.<1>Our team includes researchers from over 25 countries. <3>Our research has shown that Al technology may be able to identify COVID's unique cough signature.<2>By collecting coughs recordings from people around the world, Virufy is improving the robustness of its AI algorithm in recognizing COVID's unique sound pattern.<3>You have the power to help benefit millions of people across the globe by contributing your cough in our study.

consent.title: Consent to the Study
consent.paragraph1: Virufy cares about your privacy and is advised by licensed data privacy experts. The information and recordings you provide will only be used for the purposes described in our <1>Privacy Policy</1> and Consent Form. Please read the Consent Form:
consent.paragraph2Title: Virufy Explicit Consent to Collect Personal Information and Participate in Research Form
consent.paragraph2: "Collection of Smartphone Data for Screening of COVID-19"
consent.paragraph3: By checking the below boxes, you acknowledge that you have read and understood the Virufy privacy policy, and that you are providing your explicit consent to Virufy’s collection and processing of the categories of biometric and health information enumerated below.
consent.certifyBrazil: I certify that I am at least 18 years old and agree to the terms of this Consent Form, hereby expressly consenting to the collection and processing of my personal information, biometric information, and health information.
consent.certify: I certify that I am at least 18 years old and agree to the terms of this Consent Form.
consent.agree: I have read, understood, and agree to the terms of the Virufy Privacy Policy.
consent.collection: I hereby expressly consent to the collection and processing of my personal information, biometric information, and health information.
consent.collectionColombia: I hereby expressly consent to the collection, processing and transfer of my personal information, biometric information, and health information.
consent.detection: I hereby acknowledge and agree that processing shall be done for the purposes indicated above and, in particular but without limitation, for research and compiling a dataset needed for the development of artificial intelligence algorithms for device-based COVID-19 detection.
consent.detectionBrazil: I hereby acknowledge and agree that the processing shall be done for the purposes indicated above, and in particular, but without limitation, for the research and compilation of a data set necessary for the development of artificial intelligence algorithms for device-based device-based COVID-19 detection, to train artificial intelligence algorithms to analyze cough audio recordings to better determine COVID-19 signals.
consent.signs: I hereby acknowledge and agree that processing shall be done for the purposes indicated above and, in particular but without limitation, for training artificial intelligence algorithms to analyze cough audio recordings to better determine signs of COVID-19.
consent.biometric: I hereby expressly consent to the sharing of my personal information, biometric information, and health information with third parties as described in this Consent Form and/or the Virufy Privacy Policy.

beforeStart.title: Lastly, before we start...
beforeStart.subtitle: To ensure safety, we advise you to:
advise_list: Please use your own device and wear a mask when appropriate.
Disinfect your device and any affected or nearby surfaces after recording your cough/speech.
If you have an underlying condition that increases your risk from coughing, please check with your health care provider before participating.
If you feel your symptoms are getting worse, please contact your local medical response.

recordCough.title: Instructions
recordCough.intro1: Find a quiet environment at least 20 ft (6m) away from others and wear a cloth or surgical mask. If you are feeling ill, please sit down.
recordCough.intro2Cough: Hold your device 1-2 ft (30-60 cm) away from your mouth and do not obstruct or cover your device with plastic. Do not cough violently or too forcefully.
recordCough.intro2Breath: Hold your device 1-2 ft (30-60 cm) away from your mouth and do not obstruct or cover your device with plastic. Do not breathe violently or too forcefully.
recordCough.intro2Speech: Hold your device 1-2 ft (30-60 cm) away from your mouth and do not obstruct or cover your device with plastic. Do not speak violently or too forcefully.

recordSpeech.intro1: The sound of your voice can also help us learn what COVID sounds like! 'Please press record and count clearly from one to ten.

recordingsIntroduction.shortRecording: Please make a recording of at least 5 seconds

recordingsRecord.textCough: Tap the record button and cough intentionally into the bottom of your phone 3 times with a deep breath between each cough. When you are done, tap the stop button.
recordingsRecord.textSpeech: Tap the record button below and say a sustained ‘aaaaah’ for at least 5 seconds. When you are done, tap the stop button.
recordingsRecord.textBreath: Tap the record button and breathe deeply and loudlyinto the bottom of your phone 5 times. When you are done, tap the stop button.
recordingsRecord.textCount: Click the record button and count clearly from one to ten. When you are done, click continue.

recordingsRecordManual.micError: Can’t access the mic? Upload an audio file (.wav/.wave/.mp3/.ogg)
recordingsRecordManual.micErrorDescription: Please upload an audio file here.
recordingsRecordManual.fileDurationTooShort: Please upload a file of at least 3 seconds
recordingsRecordManual.fileSizeTooBig: Please upload a file of less than 5 MB

recordCough.intro1: Please cough away from others around you! Please sit down if you are feeling ill.
recordCough.intro2: In a quiet environment, please press record and intentionally cough around 3-5 times.

recordSpeech.intro1: The sound of your voice can also help us learn what COVID sounds like! 'Please press record and count clearly from one to ten.

recordingsListen.title: Upload Complete
recordingsListen.subtitle: Feel free to take a listen.

questionary.title: Let’s answer some quick questions!
questionary.caption: Please answer to the best of your ability.

testTaken.question: Which of the following tests have you taken for COVID-19?

resultPcrTest.question: What was the result of Patient <1><0>{{patientId}}</0></1>'s PCR-based COVID-19 test?

patient.resultAntigenTest: What was the result of Patient <1><0>{{patientId}}</0></1>'s rapid antigen COVID-19 test?

questionary.whenPcrTest: When did you take your PCR-based COVID-19 test? Please estimate if unsure.

resultPcrTest.question: What was the result of your PCR-based COVID-19 test?

questionary.whenAntibodyTest: When did you take your antibody test for COVID-19? Please estimate if unsure.

resultAntibodyTest.question: What was the result of your antibody test for COVID-19?

questionary.whenAntigenTest: When did you take your antigen test for COVID-19? Please estimate if unsure.

resultAntigenTest.question: What was the result of your antigen test for COVID-19?

vaccine.question: Have you received the COVID-19 vaccine?

biologicalSex.question: What is your biological sex?
biologicalSex.note: What sex were you assigned at birth, on your original birth certificate? This information is important for the AI to help detect COVID-19 as the sound of the voice varies across genders.

smokeLastSixMonths.question: Have you smoked regularly any time within the last six months?
smokeLastSixMonths.note: This includes cigarettes, hookah, tobacco pipes, marijuana, and vape with nicotine.

symptoms.question: Which of the below symptoms do you currently have?

questionary.symptomsDate: Approximately how many days ago did these symptoms start?

respiration.question: Which of the below respiratory conditions do you currently have?

medical.question: Which of the below medical conditions do you currently have?

options.hiv: HIV, AIDS, or impaired immune system

beforeSubmit.submitError: An error occurred. Please try again.

thankyou.title: Thank you for submitting.
thankyou.paragraph1_cough: Your cough donation brings Virufy one step closer to changing the world.
thankyou.paragraph1_voice: Your cough donation brings Virufy one step closer to changing the world.
thankyou.paragraph3:
Make sure to safeguard this submission ID, as you will need it to request Virufy to delete your anonymized data in future.

If you later develop symptoms such as cough, fever, or shortness of breath, please come back to resubmit your latest cough sounds.
thankyou.paragraph4: Provide <1>feedback</1> for us to improve our application and check out our <3>website</3>!
thankyou.paragraph5: Learn more about Virufy with our <1>news</1>!
